title: evening_temperature_empty_duck_house
summary: Evening temperature and humidity measurement recorded in an empty duck house.
description: This data unit records environmental conditions inside an empty duck house at MaMeeFarm during early evening hours. No animals were present at the time of measurement. The record serves as a baseline reference for temperature and humidity conditions without animal heat influence.

external_reference.note: Image shows digital thermo-hygrometer placed inside empty duck house.
